cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Prefetch Rule

dcmEntitySelector.title: Entity Selector
dcmEntitySelector.description: Specifies matching keys used to select entities to prefetch. Format: (study|series)[?{attributeID}={value}[&...][&priors=<n>]].

dcmSchedule.title: Time Conditions
dcmSchedule.description: Apply this rule only within specified time ranges.

dcmDuration.title: Suppress Duplicate Export Interval
dcmDuration.description: Suppress Export of entities already exported not earlier than the specified interval to avoid duplicate exports.
